title: Differences between INT and CONVERT in DAX
excerpt: How do you convert a DAX expression into an integer value? There are small differences between INT and CONVERT in DAX that may end up returning different results in arithmetic expressions. Article and download: https://sql.bi/742452?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt
